title: Womens Dress
title_original: Women’s Fair Isle Mock Neck Cable Knit Sweater | Cozy Fair Isle Sweater Women | Warm Knit Sweater for Women

specs.Best Sellers Rank: #70,142 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ( See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ) #854 in Women's Pullover Sweaters

category: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry > Women > Clothing > Sweaters > Pullovers

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater well-made, cute, and soft. The size receives mixed feedback, with some saying it's the right size while others report it runs very small.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cozy and warm.
items.body: Right size, well made,very nice design. Read more
items.author: Marie C.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute!
items.body: Super cute and soft! A great middle weight to wear in the office in winter without getting too warm. Read more
items.author: Becca

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Soft but runs small
items.body: Very Soft to wear and touch but runs small. Read more
items.author: Chitkala Seshasankaran

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sweater
items.body: Well made and sized right. Read more
items.author: Jill Harrison

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Runs VERY small
items.body: Size ran VERY small. Nice material but XL looked like a kids size. Had to return it. Read more
items.author: Lisa Riva

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well made sweater
items.body: Well made sweater. Material is thick and not flimsy like you find in many stores today. Loved mine! I love how it has extra length and not cut short like many sweaters that ride up, Read more
items.author: LC

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it
items.body: Love it. Good quality, fits great. Read more
items.author: Ely

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars It is a fitted soft sweater not a loose pullover.
items.body: The fabric is soft and comfortable and the sweater is very pretty but I was expecting a looser fitting pullover sweater instead of a fitted sweater. The picture appeared to be a loose fitting pullover but it was a fitted sweater almost like a thermal pajama top. Read more
items.author: Karen Sumner

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Pink, White. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
